name: Ceramic
challengeTitle: Build a Self-sovereign, Encrypted, Decentralized Data Hub
challengeDesc: This project is focused on building a private and decentralized data storage alternative that solves core structural issues with Web2 – specifically that Web2 platforms (e.g. Facebook) can own and gather user data that powers their 'surveillance capitalism’. With new, cutting-edge Web3 technologies... we can do better.
benefitIntro: Our team has fully integrated Yield Yak into our platform.
benefit1: Writing profile data to a user's 'hub' which is comprised of collections of data streams, made available on the Ceramic network
benefit2: Granting/revoking third-party applications (via their wallet address) the right to decrypt this data using Lit
benefit3: Enabling users to use their Hub as their ‘node’ in distributed social graph for encrypted social networking
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with Aave.
